name: Core Shaft
description:
Core Shaft is a 3D low gravity platformer taking place in a "core shaft", core shafts were drilled into the earth decades ago and serve as nothing but treacherous deep dark crevasses of the earth, you find yourself stuck in one and must escape. 

Ascend 5 times to beat the game!

Controls:

W, A, S, D - Movement

Space - Jump

E - interact

Right Click - Zoom

Each level is procedurally generated.
